Text: Hi, i dragged the endnote app and the endnote cwyw word 2011.bundle to the correct places but it still isnt working for me. endnote is fine but word cant seem to see it.

Hey,
Sometimes, you have to restart Word another time before you see the EndNote X4 submenu under the Tools menu in Word 2011. 
I don't know if I can help, but you should try to be a little more specific, e.g., do you have a 
/Applications/Microsoft Office 2011/Office/Startup/Word
folder and if yes is it possible that there is another installation of Office 2011 in another folder? You could try with Spotlight to find if there is one.

Hi,
I updated my Office for Mac and it started working! look at bjuice100 other torrents for the updates.
